Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              Position/Title: Production Photographer
              
              Department: Graphic Department
              
              Business Unit: Sofacompany VN
              

              A.	GENERAL JOB FUNCTION
              

              Based on the needs of the headquarter located in Denmark, the photographer will take pictures of all our products in our inhouse studio. The photographer will use their technical skills to create images, that meets the management’s expectations. The photographer will design the best setting, using props and backgrounds to create the right composition. In addition to taking high-quality focused product images, the photographer will also maintain all camera equipment, including lightning, lenses and tripods.
              
              After pictures are complete, our graphic team will resize, retouch, edit and otherwise enhance images.
              

              The job will include, but not be limited to:
              

              •	Select and assemble proper equipment, and choose settings and props based on HQ’s requirements
              
              •	Properly light subjects using artificial or natural lightning and using flashes and reflectors where necessary
              
              •	Determine desired images and composition and choose equipment, props, settings and lightning to achieve desired results
              
              •	Work closely with Concept Manager, to ensure desired results from HQ.
              

              B. 	RESPONSIBILITIES, DUTIES & AUTHORITIES:
              

              •	Select and assemble proper equipment, and choose settings and props based on HQ’s requirements
              
              •	Properly light subjects using artificial or natural lightning and using flashes and reflectors where necessary
              
              •	Determine desired images and composition and choose equipment, props, settings and lightning to achieve desired results
              
              •	Work closely with Concept Manager, to ensure desired results from HQ.
              

              C.	WORKING RELATIONSHIP
              
              1. Internal: Related departments
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              D. EXPERIENCE & QUALIFICATION
              
              o	Years of experience working with different product categories, preferably with furnitures.
              
              o	Ability to use different types of photographic equipment and photography software
              
              o	Understanding of artificial and natural lightning and how it affects different settings and shapes.
              
              o	Understanding of right composition and straight lines.
              
              o	Good communication skills, with the ability to discuss complex artistic in easy-to-understand terms.
              
              o	A keen eye for detail and a well-developed artistic and creative aesthetic
              
              o	Your portfolio shows a sample of brands that are comparable to the Sofacompany. It may be in lifestyle, design, fashion or similar industries.
              
              o	Of course, you are at home in all the classic design programs (InDesign, Photoshop, etc.).
              
              o	You are good at managing many tasks and have a natural structure that will prevent you from falling backwards, when there are many tasks to be prioritized and executed, even though time is sometimes limited.
              
              o	You are fluent in both English and Vietnamese.
              

              E. WORKING CONDITION
              
              Working place: 200 Trinh Thi Mieng, Thoi Tam Thon, Hoc Mon, HCMC.
              
              Working time: Full time
